Package entity

Class AppointmentOutcome

java.lang.Object
entity.AppointmentRecord
entity.AppointmentOutcome
public class AppointmentOutcome extends AppointmentRecord
Represents an appointment outcome in the Hospital Management System. Extends the AppointmentRecord class to include additional information related to service, consultation notes, and prescriptions.

  • Nested Class Summary
